title: Let us show you the home of your dreams! Tour our Studio!
posting_body: ['-- Residences on Bedford --', '(203) 208-3262', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1804 - $2000', 'Apartment:', 'Studio Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '700 sq ft', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "With renovated apartments, luxury amenities, and a location that can't be beat, The Residences on Bedford is the best way to find your dream apartment.", 'Call us to schedule a tour to view one of our 1 or 2 bedroom apartments or apply online today to find your new dream home.', "We can't wait to hear from you and we look forward in helping you make The Residences on Bedford your new home!", 'Pet Policy:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '➢ 24 Hour Convenience Store', '➢ Bowling Alley', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gas Grills', '➢ Parks Nearby', '➢ Pet Friendly', '➢ Play Area', '➢ Pool', '➢ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '➢ Beautiful Picnic Areas', '➢ Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '➢ Elegant Clubroom', '➢ Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '➢ Ice Skating Rink **', 'Winter Only', '➢ Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '➢ Near Downtown Stamford', '➢ Online Payments Available', 'Apartment features include:', '➢ All Units Come With Brand New Hardwood Floors!', '➢ Black Appliances', '➢ Blinds', '➢ Garage', '➢ Gas Ranges', '➢ Heating', '➢ Large, Private Balconies', '➢ Spectacular Views in Select Units', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Updated Interior Finishes', 'Phone:', '(203) 208-3262', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Managed by JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A02AA03AF6A74617']
